title: Festival Awakening
desc: The town square buzzes with lanterns and vendors. There's a booth emitting a soft hum.

choices.label: Inspect the humming booth (pick up optional seed S05)

title: Reliquary Cavern
desc: A dug-out reliquary. Deep within you sense a guarded artifact.

choices.label: Search the chamber (may drop essential seed S22)
Attempt Anchor mini-game (to open sealed vault)

title: Abandoned Laboratory
desc: Dusty instruments line a ruined bench. A faint glow from a cracked display draws your eye.

choices.label: Inspect the workbench (find an odd token S99)
Read the old log (text)
choices.text: The log describes an experiment that stalled at the moment of 'mirroring.'
